subject: Quality specialist technical review
description:
Run quality specialist review on the fibonacci implementation using the `quality-specialist` agent.

Review for:
- Correctness of fibonacci algorithm
- Coding philosophy compliance (immutability, function structure)

- Documentation quality (JSDoc preambles)

Files to review:
- `src/utils/fibonacci.ts`
- `tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts`
